title: Bug 16762[Editor Mgmt] Fast view and editor activation inconvenience
description: Bug 16762[Editor Mgmt] Fast view and editor activation inconvenience
OB: use the JUnit view as fast view run a testsuite doubleclick on a test in the hierarchy or on a line from a stacktrace of afailurethe appropriate editor gets focused minimize the JUnit viewthe previously active editor gets the focus, whichis not the expected behaviour
